name: rotative
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a machine) having a part that moves around in a circle: Watt's rotative engine is preserved in the Science Museum. Samuel Clegg obtained the patent for his horizontal rotative retort. Synonym
rotary
More examplesFewer examplesHis many rotative engines all had a clumsy arrangement of beams with vertical cylinders.A Victorian steam rotative beam engine that pumped London's effluence from its centres of population is being restored.He also obtained the patent for his rotative gas meter and self-acting governor.
